sourcesContent:
<template>
	<vue-flip
		:active-hover = "true"
		width					= "635px"
		height				= "315px"
	>
		<template v-slot:front>
			true
		</template>
		<template v-slot:back >
			false
		</template>
	</vue-flip>
</template>

<script>
import VueFlip from 'vue-flip';

export default {
	name: 'credit-card',

	components: { 'vue-flip': VueFlip },
}
</script>

<style lang = 'scss'>
@font-face {
	font-family: 'Cera Pro Medium';
	src: url('@/assets/CeraPro/CeraPro-Medium.eot'); //CeraPro-Thin.eot
	src: url('@/assets/CeraPro/CeraPro-Medium.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),
	url('@/assets/CeraPro/CeraPro-Medium.woff') format('woff'),
	url('@/assets/CeraPro/CeraPro-Medium.ttf') format('truetype');
	font-weight: normal;
	font-style: normal;
}
.front,
.back {
	font-family: 'Cera Pro Medium';
	border-radius: 30px;
	width: 635px;
	height: 315px;
	padding: 30px;
	background: linear-gradient(177.23deg, #9C2CF3 -13.49%, #3A49F9 109.75%);
	box-shadow: 0px 4px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
	opacity: 0.6;
}

</style>
